sentence: It's up to Brian Kemp and David Perdue to explain to Republican women and to all Georgians why they are excluding Kandiss Taylor from participating in multiple Republican primary debates,? Groh-Wargo said.

sentence: On Monday, Pence made his most emphatic break yet with the ex-president when he headlined a rally for Trump foe Brian Kemp on the eve of the Georgia governor's landslide victory over a Trump-backed primary challenger.
